abstract: Johnson & Johnson said Crucell, a Dutch vaccine manufacturer, had agreed to its 1.75 billion-euro ($2.4 billion) takeover bid.
snippet: Johnson & Johnson said Crucell, a Dutch vaccine manufacturer, had agreed to its 1.75 billion-euro ($2.4 billion) takeover bid.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson has agreed to buy the rest of Crucell that it doesn’t own for 1.75 billion euros, or $2.4 billion.

headline.main: J.&J. Reaches $2.4 Billion Deal for Crucell
